summary: This bill, S. 2661, allows owners and operators of pipeline facilities to use risk-based inspections for in-service breakout tanks, according to the requirements under U.S. Code Title 49, Chapter 601, and including regulations from the Code of Federal Regulations, Title 49, section 195. It mandates the Secretary of Transportation, through the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, to revise 49 CFR 195.432 to reflect this allowance. The goal is to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of tank inspections.
